Course Description: This course covers various advanced topics in mobile computing such as sensing and activity inference, mobile communications, road and traffic sensing etc. to create the next-generation mobile computing systems.

Course Outcomes.CO1: Student will be aware of the issues and challenges in the mobile computing domain
Course Outcomes.CO2: Students will be able to critique various research papers
Course Outcomes.CO3: Student will be able to design and develop advanced mobile computing solutions using various components of mobile computing
Course Outcomes.CO4: Student will be able to design and develop advanced mobile computing solutions using various components of mobile computing

Weekly Lecture Plan.Lecture Topic: Course overview, introduction to mobile computing
Mobile Communication, Opportunistic communication, acoustic communation
Road and traffic sensing, localization and location based services
Mobile sensor based participatory sensing system

Resource Material.Title: Proceeding of IEEE/ACM transactions and conferences, e.g. MobiSys, MobiCom, Sensys etc. on mobile computing related areas All the papers will be made available by the instructor and posted on course website.
